src:
High school teacher charged with having sexual relationship with student
01 Nov 2019, 03:45 by WSOCTV.com


Emma Neil Ogle, 63, of Huntersville, was arrested and charged Thursday with having sex with a student, crime against nature with a student and felony indecent liberties with a student. (WSOCTV.com)

CHARLOTTE, N.C. - A career and technical education health occupations teacher at Garinger High School in Charlotte, North Carolina is facing several charges in connection with having a sexual relationship with a student.



>> Read more trending news



Emma Neil Ogle, 63, of Huntersville, North Carolina was arrested and charged Thursday with having sex with a student, crime against nature with a student and felony indecent liberties with a student.
She allegedly began a relationship with a 17-year-old in the spring and it got sexual during the summer.
The student reported her to a staff member at Garinger.
Her bond was set at $10,000.
© 2019 Cox Media Group.
